title: Little Garakuta's Cool (＊Author's subjectivity) ACS icons +α
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Artwork:** Little Garakuta's Cool (＊Author's subjectivity) ACS icons +α
**Original-Title:** Little Garakutaのクールな(※本人調べ)ACSアイコン集+α
**Auther:** [[*user Little Garakuta]]
**Created:** 2025
**Translator:** [[*user Verzweiflung]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
= [[size 120%]]**The icons on this page, with some exceptions, rely on [*http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/anomaly-classification-system-guide Anomaly Classification System].**[[/size]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
[[collapsible show="+ How to use ACS" hide="- Hide"]]
[[<]]
[[div style="display: flex; align-content: stretch; padding-top: 1em; border-top: 1px dashed #999; font-size: 80%;"]]
[[>]]
> 
> Beginning of include→
> 
> Item # of SCP→
> 
> Clearance Level→
> 
> Container Class→
> 
> Secondary Class→
> 
> Secondary Class Icon→
> 
> Disruption Class→
> 
> Risk Class→
>  
> End of include→
> 
[[/>]]
>
> {{[[@@include@@ :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source}}
> 
> |item-number= XXXX-JP
> 
> |clearance= 3
> 
> |container-class= esoteric
> 
> |secondary-class= //[Arbitrary class]//
> 
> |secondary-icon= //[URL of the class icon used above]//
> 
> |disruption-class= vlam
> 
> |risk-class= danger
> 
> ]]
>
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
----
//Here's what you're going to do, OK?//
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= XXXX-JP
|clearance= 3
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= ignosi
|secondary-icon= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Ignosi-class.svg
|disruption-class= vlam
|risk-class= danger
]]
@@ @@
----
@@ @@
= //More updates to come.//
@@ @@
[[=]]
+ ACS Icon
[[/=]]
@@ @@
[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:solid 1px #000000; background:#F2F2F2; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
++ Object Class
[[/=]]
[[div_ class="step_container"]]
[[div_ class="icons"]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Binah-class_Mk-3%20%281%29.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Binah[[footnote]]Item can affect the collective human consciousness, and may thereby affect reality.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Conscientia-class.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Conscientia[[footnote]]Item cannot be physically contained, necessitating that the public be led to believe it is non-anomalous.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Hod-class.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Hod[[footnote]]Item can significantly impact the Foundation's operations, but will only do so if the Foundation allows it.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Hariti-class.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Hariti[[footnote]]Item is a member of Foundation personnel whose anomalous characteristics require no containment measures not already satisfied by their duties and posting.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Ignosi-class.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Ignosi[[footnote]]Item's discovery, even by the Foundation, must be prevented.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Nagi-class.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Nagi[[footnote]] Item has lost its anomalous or dangerous features in a long span for some reason. The containment protocol will be continued and will be immediately replaced with the appropriate object class if there are signs of anomalous activity again.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
++ Disruption Class
[[/=]]

[[div_ class="step_container"]]
[[div_ class="icons"]]

[[div_ class="icon_container"]]
[[div_ class="icon_image color-white"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/little-garakuta-s-iconworks/Amurg-class_Mk-2%20%281%29.svg]]
[[/div]]
[[div_ class="icon_name"]]
Amurg[[footnote]]While the known disruption capacity of the item is relatively low, it means that its potential disruption capacity is very strong. Therefore, attempts must be made to curb the threat.[[/footnote]][[footnote]]Means “twilight” in Romanian.[[/footnote]][[footnote]]**Author's note:** This class will be used in my future article.[[/footnote]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@

+ Other Icon
[[/=]]

[[module CSS]]
.icons {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(5, calc((100% / 5) - 0.25rem));
    grid-gap: 0.25rem;
}

.class-table-box {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 75%;
    background-color: rgb(var(--black-monochrome));
    grid-gap: 0.125rem;
    margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.class-table-box > div {
    padding: 0.5rem;
}

.class-name {
    font-family: var(--title-font);
    font-size: 1.15em;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.class-description {
    background-color: rgb(var(--white-monochrome));
}

@media (max-width: 500px ) {
.icons {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(3, calc((100% / 3) - 0.25rem));
}
}

.icon_image {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(var(--black-monochrome, 12, 12, 12));
    overflow: hidden;
}

.icon_name,
.icon_link {
    font-family: var(--title-font);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

h1, h2 {
    text-align: center;
}

.step_container {
    margin: 0.5rem 0;
    border: 1px solid #999;
    padding: 1em;
}

.help {
    display: flex;
    align-content: stretch;
    padding-top: 1em;
    border-top: 1px dashed #999;
}

.help blockquote {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 85%;
}

.help blockquote > p {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    margin-right: 0;
    min-height: 2rem;
    margin: 0;
}

.help blockquote > p * {
    margin: 0 0.1rem;
    height: 100%;
}

.help blockquote:nth-of-type(1) {
    width: 50%;
    background: transparent;
    border: unset;
    box-shadow: unset;
    text-align: right;
    margin-right: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.help blockquote:nth-of-type(1) > p {
    justify-content: flex-end;
}

.help blockquote:nth-of-type(2) {
    margin-left: 1em;
    width: 50%;
}

#page-content > .collapsible-block {
    display: block;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0.75em;
    background-color: lightgrey;
    border-top: 0.125rem dashed slategrey;
    border-bottom: 0.125rem dashed slategrey;
}

#page-content > div.collapsible-block > div.collapsible-block-unfolded > div.collapsible-block-content {
    text-align:left;
}
[[/module]]
author: Verzweiflung
